content.rendered: Samuel is an Accounting & Financial Information systems Graduate and Professional business development specialist with 3 years  experience in the mechanical and electrical engineering industry. He has been Involved in management and development of new business opportunities in the oil & gas, food, pharmaceutical and waste to energy markets to mention a few.
